title: David Lynch's book "Catching the Big Fish"
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080603172012im_/http:/typophile.com/files/lynch1_4674.jpg)

The cover font could be a unique creation (it is not used in the body of the text, just cover and titles) but can anyone refer me to a similar font if not the exact one? Cheers.

 [‹ Obama fonts (that aren't Gotham or Perpetua or Trajan, I swear)](http://web.archive.org/web/20080603172012/http:/typophile.com/node/45924 "Go to previous forum topic") [Renaldo typeface? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080603172012/http:/typophile.com/node/45993 "Go to next forum topic")
author: lucadelcarlo

comments.content: The sample is tiny, but I think it’s [Mayo](http://web.archive.org/web/20080603172012/http:/www.fountain.nu/catalogue/mayo.asp).
